content: introducing my puff beanie hat this hat is a soft and warm fashionable beanie hat the puff is the main feature of this chunky beanie made with lion brand wool ease thick and quick 6 super bulky yarn it is a 20% wool/80% acrylic blend yarn so it is super soft and squishy so comfy and warm this beanie is so versatile and can be worn with practically any outfit you desire it is a simple beginner hat is a great accessory for fall winter or even the cool days and nights of spring chic and cozy
